Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored early in the second half to secure a 1-0 home win over Poland.
Hand ball by Karol Swiderski (Poland) in the 90'+4' minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia had 60.4% possession compared to Poland's 39.6%.
Croatia had 6 shots on goal while Poland had 2.
Croatia had 23 shot attempts compared to Poland's 11.
Croatia received 5 yellow cards while Poland received 1.
Croatia had 8 corner kicks compared to Poland's 2.
The match was held at Opus Arena in Osijek, Croatia with an attendance of 12,612.
